price: 63. Zo dwalende degenen die de tekenen van Allah ontkennen.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُؤۡفَكُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yu'faku alladhīna kānū biāyāti al-lahi yajḥadūna
